description: Security operations dashboard for incident investigation, audit trail analysis, and compliance reporting in inboxfewer.

panels.title: Total Tool Invocations (24h)
panels.description: Total number of MCP tool operations in the last 24 hours across all users.

panels.title: Failed Operations (24h)
panels.description: Number of tool operations that failed in the last 24 hours. High values may indicate security issues.

panels.title: Auth Failures (24h)
panels.description: Authentication failures in the last 24 hours. Spikes may indicate brute force attempts.

panels.title: Unique Users (Active)
panels.description: Number of distinct user accounts active. Requires detailedLabels to be enabled.

panels.title: Operations Timeline by Service
panels.description: Activity volume over time broken down by Google service.

panels.title: Write Operations Timeline
panels.description: Timeline of write operations (create, update, delete) across all services.

panels.title: Failed Operations Timeline
panels.description: Timeline of failed operations. Correlate with other anomalies for incident investigation.

panels.title: Activity by Service
panels.description: Distribution of activity across Google services.

panels.title: Top Tools by Activity
panels.description: Most used tools by operation count. Useful for identifying unusual activity patterns.

panels.title: Activity Heatmap by Hour
panels.description: Activity distribution by hour of day. Identifies unusual off-hours activity.

panels.title: Tool Usage by Type (Read vs Write)
panels.description: Comparison of read-only vs write operations over time.

panels.title: Service Access Patterns
panels.description: Service access patterns over time for identifying unusual access.

panels.title: Sensitive Operations
panels.description: High-risk operations including email sending, file deletion, and sharing changes.

panels.title: Auth Events by Result
panels.description: Authentication events broken down by success/failure over time.

panels.title: Token Refresh by Result
panels.description: OAuth token refresh results over time.

panels.title: Expired Token Retrievals
panels.description: Attempts to use expired tokens. High values indicate configuration issues.

targets.expr: {app="inboxfewer", namespace=~"$namespace"} | json | msg=~"tool.*" | line_format "{{.tool | default .msg}} - {{.google_service | default \"system\"}}/{{.operation | default \"execute\"}} - {{if eq .status \"success\"}}SUCCESS{{else if eq .status \"error\"}}FAILED{{else if eq .success \"true\"}}SUCCESS{{else}}{{.status | default \"UNKNOWN\"}}{{end}}{{if .duration}} ({{.duration}}){{end}}"

panels.title: Audit Logs
panels.description: Real-time audit log stream from Loki. Contains detailed operation records.

targets.expr: {app="inboxfewer", namespace=~"$namespace"} | json | status=~"error|failure" or error!="" | line_format "{{.tool | default .msg}}: {{.error | default \"operation failed\"}}"

panels.title: Error Details
panels.description: Detailed error messages from failed operations.

panels.title: Burst Activity Detection
panels.description: Identifies sudden spikes in activity that may indicate compromised accounts.

targets.expr: {app="inboxfewer", namespace=~"$namespace"} | json | msg=~"tool.*" | trace_id!="" | line_format "trace={{.trace_id}} tool={{.tool | default .msg}} service={{.google_service | default \"system\"}} op={{.operation | default \"execute\"}} {{if eq .status \"success\"}}SUCCESS{{else if eq .status \"error\"}}FAILED{{else if eq .success \"true\"}}SUCCESS{{else}}{{.status | default \"UNKNOWN\"}}{{end}}"

panels.title: Trace Links from Audit Logs
panels.description: Audit logs with trace IDs for correlation with distributed tracing.

title: Inboxfewer - Security Operations Dashboard
